snippet: Tony Stewart, who struck and killed the driver Kevin Ward Jr. during a sprint car event last weekend, will miss his second straight Sprint Cup race Sunday at Michigan International Speedway.
abstract: Tony Stewart, who struck and killed driver Kevin Ward Jr during sprint car event, will miss his second consecutive Nascar Sprint Cup race at Michigan International Speedway; his plans for the rest of the season have not yet been determined.
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart, who struck and killed the driver Kevin Ward Jr. during a sprint car event last weekend, will miss his second straight Sprint Cup race Sunday at Michigan International Speedway.

headline.main: Stewart Will Sit Out a Second Nascar Race
headline.print_headline: Stewart Will Sit Out a Second Nascar Race

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
